meta.title: Operation of Magnetic Stirrer with Hot Plate

sections.purpose: To simultaneously heat and stir microbiological media or reagents.
sections.scope: Applicable to media preparation and reagent dissolution.
procedure: Place a heat-resistant flask with stir bar on the center of the plate.
Switch ON the stirring function and set a moderate speed.
Switch ON the heating function and set the desired temperature.
Monitor the solution to prevent boiling over.
After dissolution, turn OFF heat first, then stirring.
Allow the plate to cool before removing the flask and cleaning the surface.
precautions: Do not heat flammable solvents to their flash point.
Keep the power cord clear of the hot surface.
Avoid very high speeds that cause splashing.
Use PPE when handling hot liquids.
